text: aur tumamen se jin logon kee mrtyu ho jae aur apane peechhe patniyon chhod jae, arthaat apanee patniyon ke haq mein yah vaseeyat chhod jae ki ghar se nikaale bina ek varsh tak unhen kharch diya jae, to yadi ve nikal jaen to apane lie saamaany niyam ke anusaar ve jo kuchh bhee karen usamen tumhaare lie koee dosh nahin. allaah atyant prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai
